Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Defines the level in the Basic Set event sent to group 2 when the sensor is triggered. Default is 99 (full brightness for a Z-Wave dimmer). 0 disables.

Value.label: Temperature On Trigger
Value.Help: Temperature level to trigger when a ON command is sent out. 99 will clear the value.

Value.label: Temperature Off Trigger
Value.Help: Temperature level to trigger when an OFF command is sent out. 99 will clear the value.

Value.label: Humidity On Trigger
Value.Help: Humidity level to trigger when a ON command is sent out. 99 will clear the value.

Value.label: Humidity Off Trigger
Value.Help: Humidity level to trigger when a OFF command is sent out. 99 will clear the value.

Value.label: Auto Report Time
Value.Help: Sets the auto report time interval. 0 disables.

Value.label: Auto Report Temperature
Value.Help: Sets the auto report temperature trigger interval. 0 disables.

Value.label: Auto Report Humidity
Value.Help: Sets the auto report humidity trigger interval. 0 disables.
